topics.title: Buddy System
topics.content:
# Buddy System

Create groups of agents across projects to collaborate on shared deliverables. Agents communicate through a shared filesystem directory, with the plugin providing real-time UI updates via file watching.

## Quick Start

1. Click the **Buddy Groups** rail item
2. Click **+ New Group** to create a group
3. Add durable agents from any open project
4. Designate a group leader
5. Assign a mission to the group

topics.title: Permissions
topics.content:
## Permissions

| Permission | Why it's needed |
|------------|----------------|
| **logging** | Debug plugin operations |
| **storage** | Persist group data globally |
| **files / files.watch** | Monitor shared communication directory |
| **agents** | List and resume agents across projects |
| **projects** | Enumerate projects for agent discovery |
| **notifications** | Alert on group events |
| **commands** | Register group management commands |
| **widgets** | Display agent avatars and status |
| **badges** | Show unread communication count |
| **navigation** | Focus on agents in the UI |
| **theme** | Consistent styling |
| **agent-config** | Inject skills and instructions into group members |
| **agent-config.cross-project** | Configure agents in other projects |
| **agent-config.permissions** | Grant filesystem access to group members |
